title: description
description: As a Full Stack Engineer since 2017, I have successfully developed and launched over 20 large and medium-sized websites, in a diverse range of industries including E-Commerce, E-Learning, Real Estate, and Finance, BlockChain among others. My expertise extends to extra front-end development skills such as Graphical Design Tools using Fabric.js & Three.js, Search Engine Optimization (SEO), Core Web Vitals (CWV), and Analytics Tools, ensuring optimal performance and user engagement across all projects. Rich experience of back-end development, including RESTful APIs and Database Structuring & Management, and still on the way to learning and improving in these areas. Also cool experience about BlockChain regarding NFT Market Place, building Smart Contract using Solidity or Solana.

title: certification-description-1
description:
Achieved Senior Level Certification in Next.js from HackerRank, validating advanced expertise in building and optimizing web applications using Next.js. Key areas of proficiency include:
Advanced Development: Mastery of SSR, SSG, and dynamic routing for scalable applications. Performance Optimization: Expertise in application speed and efficiency enhancements. Secure and Accessible Web Practices: Knowledge in implementing security measures and optimizing for SEO and accessibility. Deployment Expertise: Experience with deploying and scaling applications using modern cloud platforms. This certification highlights my ability to lead Next.js development projects and mentor teams with best practices in modern web development.
